briefTitle: A Short Treatment Study of Aripiprazole in Pediatric Patients With Autistic Disorder
officialTitle: A Short-term Administration Study of Aripiprazole in Children and Adolescents (Age: 6 to 17 Years) With Autistic Disorder
summary: The objective of this study is to investigate the efficacy and safety of aripiprazole orally administered over a period of 8 weeks in pediatric patients with Autistic Disorder

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Change From Baseline in the Aberrant Behavior Checklist Japanese Version (ABC-J) Irritability Subscale Score
